thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Vinny Dinoto
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Vinny Dinoto

author: Vinny Dinoto
title: Vinny Dinoto
text:
I rented a car for a week from Omega when I was mountain biking around NZ. I drove from Queenstown to Auckland during the course of that time. The car was a small Tiida, and it's gas mileage was great and the car gave me no mechanical issues going through the mountains. The reps I dealt with in the office were also friendly.
The only hitch I faced was that the price I was Quote: d over e-mail ended up being different than what I paid in person. This issue was resolved (after a long e-mail exchange back and forth over the course of a few weeks) by them issuing a refund for the difference, so I'm a happy guy.
I recommend renting from them because they did have a good price and car, just be sure to verify the Quote: to what you pay in person. My only recommendation to Omega is to attempt to resolve problems a little faster, but again overall this was a good experience and I have no major complaints.
